The script creates a `TrustRoot.yaml` file that contains the base64-encoded TUF root.json and repository.tgz files to validate container images' keyless signature authorities in ***air-gapped*** [Sigstore Kubernetes Policy Controller](https://docs.sigstore.dev/policy-controller/overview/) deployments.

This script uses the cosign CLI to initialize a trust root and download the respective versioned metadata files to a local repository directory.

It then copies the targets from the ~/.sigstore/root directory to the repository/targets directory, prefixing them with their respective sha512 hash.

Lastly, it compresses repository directory to repository.tgz.

Based on the [Configuring TrustRoot for custom TUF repository](https://docs.sigstore.dev/policy-controller/overview/#configuring-trustroot-for-custom-tuf-repository) docs:

> If you have a TUF set up, but are unable to access the mirror (air-gap for example), you can provide the serialized repository. In this mode however, you have to manually rotate the keys/certificates.
```
apiVersion: policy.sigstore.dev/v1alpha1
kind: TrustRoot
metadata:
  name: my-repository-serialized
spec:
  repository:
    root: |-
      ROOT_JSON
    mirrorFS: |-
      REPOSITORY
```
> where `ROOT_JSON` is base64 encoded `root.json` file from the TUF. `REPOSITORY` is a tarred, gzipped, and base64 encoded remote repository. So you would have to get tar the repository, gzip it and then base64 encode it.

The script can be run with the following command:
```sh
bash trustroot.sh [<tuf_root_url> <tuf_mirror_url>]
```
example:
```
bash trustroot.sh https://tuf.sigstore.local/root.json https://tuf.sigstore.local
```
The script will output a `TrustRoot.yaml` file that can be used to deploy the trust root to a Kubernetes cluster.

### Deploy the TrustRoot

The trust root can be deployed to a Kubernetes cluster using the following command:
```sh
kubectl apply -f TrustRoot.yaml
```
The trust root will be deployed to the cluster and can be used to verify container images signatures off-line.
List them using the following command:
```sh
kubectl get TrustRoot
```

### Prerequisites

- curl
- shasum
- jq
- cosign

### Example output

```
$ ./trustroot.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sigstore/root-signing/refs/heads/main/metadata/root.json https://tuf-repo-cdn.sigstore.dev
Using custom sigstore 'root':https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sigstore/root-signing/refs/heads/main/metadata/root.json and 'mirror':https://tuf-repo-cdn.sigstore.dev:

cosign Root status:
 {
	"local": "/home/prezha/.sigstore/root",
	"remote": "https://tuf-repo-cdn.sigstore.dev",
	"metadata": {
		"root.json": {
			"version": 10,
			"len": 6911,
			"expiration": "19 Feb 25 08:04 UTC",
			"error": ""
		},
		"snapshot.json": {
			"version": 156,
			"len": 1758,
			"expiration": "31 Aug 34 13:31 UTC",
			"error": ""
		},
		"targets.json": {
			"version": 10,
			"len": 5624,
			"expiration": "24 Aug 34 07:16 UTC",
			"error": ""
		},
		"timestamp.json": {
			"version": 243,
			"len": 449,
			"expiration": "30 Nov 24 07:24 UTC",
			"error": ""
		}
	},
	"targets": [
		"rekor.pub",
		"trusted_root.json",
		"artifact.pub",
		"ctfe.pub",
		"ctfe_2022.pub",
		"fulcio.crt.pem",
		"fulcio_intermediate_v1.crt.pem",
		"fulcio_v1.crt.pem"
	]
}

using remote: https://tuf-repo-cdn.sigstore.dev

downloading metadata files:
 - root.json version: 10 ... done
 - snapshot.json version: 156 ... done
 - targets.json version: 10 ... done
 - timestamp.json version: 243 ... done

copying targets from .sigstore to repository/targets using their respective sha512:

 - /home/prezha/.sigstore/root/targets/ctfe.pub -> repository/targets/4b20747d1afe2544238ad38cc0cc3010921b177d60ac743767e0ef675b915489bd01a36606c0ff83c06448622d7160f0d866c83d20f0c0f44653dcc3f9aa0bd4.ctfe.pub ... done
 - /home/prezha/.sigstore/root/targets/ctfe_2022.pub -> repository/targets/e83fa4f427b24ee7728637fad1b4aa45ebde2ba02751fa860694b1bb16059a490328f9985e51cc70e4d237545315a1bc866dc4fdeef2f6248d99cc7a6077bf85.ctfe_2022.pub ... done
 - /home/prezha/.sigstore/root/targets/fulcio.crt.pem -> repository/targets/0713252a7fd17f7f3ab12f88a64accf2eb14b8ad40ca711d7fe8b4ecba3b24db9e9dffadb997b196d3867b8f9ff217faf930d80e4dab4e235c7fc3f07be69224.fulcio.crt.pem ... done
 - /home/prezha/.sigstore/root/targets/fulcio_intermediate_v1.crt.pem -> repository/targets/0f99f47dbc26c5f1e3cba0bfd9af4245a26e5cb735d6ef005792ec7e603f66fdb897de985973a6e50940ca7eff5e1849719e967b5ad2dac74a29115a41cf6f21.fulcio_intermediate_v1.crt.pem ... done
 - /home/prezha/.sigstore/root/targets/fulcio_v1.crt.pem -> repository/targets/f2e33a6dc208cee1f51d33bbea675ab0f0ced269617497985f9a0680689ee7073e4b6f8fef64c91bda590d30c129b3070dddce824c05bc165ac9802f0705cab6.fulcio_v1.crt.pem ... done
 - /home/prezha/.sigstore/root/targets/rekor.pub -> repository/targets/0ae7705e02db33e814329746a4a0e5603c5bdcd91c96d072158d71011a2695788866565a2fec0fe363eb72cbcaeda39e54c5fe8d416daf9f3101fdba4217ef35.rekor.pub ... done
 - /home/prezha/.sigstore/root/targets/trusted_root.json -> repository/targets/fdebade075c4840d40f1806a14d0660ae1d22f47c0516abc4141e09f4ddf6ee6f4dbfbf08a7025bea10a4b8794658a4cd8ebb1024b963f239a9bfe02c2057fc6.trusted_root.json ... done

using base64 encoded repository.tgz: 

using base64 encoded root.json: 

generating TrustRoot.yaml:

apiVersion: policy.sigstore.dev/v1alpha1
kind: TrustRoot
metadata:
  name: tuf-repo-cdn.sigstore.dev-1732479585

  repository:
    root: |-
      
    mirrorFS: |-
      

done.

Use 'kubectl apply -f TrustRoot.yaml' to deploy the TrustRoot.
```

```
$ tree --dirsfirst --noreport
.
├── repository
│	├── targets
│	│	├── 0713252a7fd17f7f3ab12f88a64accf2eb14b8ad40ca711d7fe8b4ecba3b24db9e9dffadb997b196d3867b8f9ff217faf930d80e4dab4e235c7fc3f07be69224.fulcio.crt.pem

│	│	├── 0f99f47dbc26c5f1e3cba0bfd9af4245a26e5cb735d6ef005792ec7e603f66fdb897de985973a6e50940ca7eff5e1849719e967b5ad2dac74a29115a41cf6f21.fulcio_intermediate_v1.crt.pem
│	│	├── 308fd1d1d95d7f80aa33b837795251cc3e886792982275e062409e13e4e236ffc34d676682aa96fdc751414de99c864bf132dde71581fa651c6343905e3bf988.artifact.pub
│	│	├── 4b20747d1afe2544238ad38cc0cc3010921b177d60ac743767e0ef675b915489bd01a36606c0ff83c06448622d7160f0d866c83d20f0c0f44653dcc3f9aa0bd4.ctfe.pub

│	│	├── f2e33a6dc208cee1f51d33bbea675ab0f0ced269617497985f9a0680689ee7073e4b6f8fef64c91bda590d30c129b3070dddce824c05bc165ac9802f0705cab6.fulcio_v1.crt.pem
│	│	└── fdebade075c4840d40f1806a14d0660ae1d22f47c0516abc4141e09f4ddf6ee6f4dbfbf08a7025bea10a4b8794658a4cd8ebb1024b963f239a9bfe02c2057fc6.trusted_root.json
│	├── 10.root.json
│	├── 10.targets.json
│	├── 156.snapshot.json
│	└── timestamp.json
├── TrustRoot.yaml
├── readme.md
├── repository.tgz
└── trustroot.sh
```
```
$ kubectl apply -f TrustRoot.yaml
trustroot.policy.sigstore.dev/tuf-repo-cdn.sigstore.dev-1732479585 created
```
```
$ kubectl get TrustRoot
NAME                                   AGE
tuf-repo-cdn.sigstore.dev-1732479585   5s
```
